Sentencas: Solid oxide cells (SOCs) can be operated either as fuel cells (SOFC) to convert fuels to electricity or as electrolyzers (SOEC) to convert electricity to fuels such as hydrogen or methane.
Titulo: Pressurized Operation of a Planar Solid Oxide Cell Stack

Sentencas: Pressurized operation of SOCs provide several benefits on both cell and system level.
Titulo: Pressurized Operation of a Planar Solid Oxide Cell Stack

Sentencas: If successfully matured, pressurized SOEC based electrolyzers can become more efficient both energy-and cost-wise than PEM and Alkaline systems.
Titulo: Pressurized Operation of a Planar Solid Oxide Cell Stack

Sentencas: Pressurization of SOFCs can significantly increase the cell power density and reduce the size of auxiliary components.
Titulo: Pressurized Operation of a Planar Solid Oxide Cell Stack

Sentencas: In the present study, a SOC stack was successfully operated at pressures up to 25 bar.
Titulo: Pressurized Operation of a Planar Solid Oxide Cell Stack

Sentencas: The pressure dependency of the measured current-voltage (I-V) curves and impedance spectra on the SOC stack are analyzed and the relation between various system parameters and pressure is derived.
Titulo: Pressurized Operation of a Planar Solid Oxide Cell Stack

Sentencas: With increasing pressure the open circuit voltage (OCV) and the reaction kinetics (electrode performance) increases for thermodynamic and kinetic reasons, respectively.
Titulo: Pressurized Operation of a Planar Solid Oxide Cell Stack

Sentencas: Further, the summit frequency of the gas concentration impedance arc and the pressure difference across the stack and heat exchangers is seen to decrease with increasing pressure following a power-law expression.
Titulo: Pressurized Operation of a Planar Solid Oxide Cell Stack

Sentencas: Finally a durability test was conducted at 10 bar.
Titulo: Pressurized Operation of a Planar Solid Oxide Cell Stack
